snippet.title: The Stairway 7 - Release Date Trailer (Anomaly Loop Horror Game)
snippet.description:
WISHLIST IT NOW ON STEAM ►► https://store.steampowered.com/app/2911820/The_Stairway_7__Anomaly_Hunt_Loop_Horror_Game/Join Our 

RELEASED ►► MAY 17th, 2024

DISCORD ►► https://discord.com/invite/d8WUuuRCJK

SUPPORT MY DREAM & GET Early Access ►► https://www.patreon.com/steelkrill

The Stairway 7 is an endless loop anomaly hunt and observation "spot the difference" game where you are stuck in a endless loop of stairways with a cat and you have to observe your surroundings carefully to reach the exit. Anomalies are watching, and ready to hunt you down. Don't take them with you. 

WISHLIST IT ON STEAM ► https://store.steampowered.com/app/2911820/The_Stairway_7__Anomaly_Hunt_Loop_Horror_Game/GAME 

Press Kit ► https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1rD5uBnkVCv5VvW9Vjk3BI1T_wyONH9eU?usp=sharing

IndieDB ► https://www.indiedb.com/games/the-stairway-7-anomaly-hunt-loop-horror-game

Website ► https://steelkrill.com

Twitter ► https://twitter.com/steelkrill

TikTok ► https://TikTok.com/@SteelkrillStudio

Instagram ► https://instagram.com/Steelkrill#horrorgamestamillive 

#horrorgames2023 #horrorgaming #horrorstories #halloween #scarygaming #gamingvideos #newgames #gaming #mascotas
